title: Hextech is not fair!
body: I have been playing since start of 2015 and i am a FTP player and sice your realsed hextech i got only legacy and epic skin NO HIGHER and my brother that has been playing since mid 2017 alredy GOT 2 and my friend from class got 1 and she startes playing A MONTH AGO so this isnt friking fair can you guys in rito plz fix this for me this is sooo unfair!!!

replies.body: no toilet paper around when you really need it is NOT FAIR
They are only skins, and give no advantage.

Randomness is not fair.

Life is not fair.

Spend money if you want guaranteed shit.
